parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the MSE instance to which the service belongs.

> You must specify InstanceId or ClusterId.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description:
The name of the cluster to which the service belongs.

> The cluster is a concept for Nacos services and is not equivalent to a Microservices Engine (MSE) instance.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The group to which the service belongs.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance to which the service belongs.

> You must specify InstanceId or ClusterId.

parameters.name: NamespaceId
parameters.description: The namespace to which the service belongs.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: RequestPars
parameters.description: The extended request parameters in the JSON format.

parameters.name: ServiceName
parameters.description: The name of the service whose listeners you want to query.
